tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE InventoryAudit (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  product_id INT,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  physical_count INT,
  database_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE InventoryCounts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    physical_count INT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE DatabaseRecords (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    database_count INT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Discrepancies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    physical_count INT NOT NULL,
    database_count INT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE AuditLog (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE discrepancy (
    discrepancy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    reason TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (audit_id) REFERENCES inventory_audit(audit_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES product(product_id)
);
